description: This Python source file contains pytest test cases for testing a Nuxt project template initialization system within a larger project. It includes fixtures for setting up mock template directories with configuration files, and tests for verifying template info retrieval, project initialization, post-processing execution, configuration loading, and variable substitution in templates.

classes.name: ProjectConfig
classes.description: Configuration data class for project settings, including name, version, description, author, type, output path, and parameters.

classes.name: ProjectType
classes.description: Enumeration defining different project types, e.g., NUXT.

classes.name: TemplateInitInfo
classes.description: Class holding initialization information for a template, including environment commands and scripts.

classes.name: ProjectInitializer
classes.description: Main class responsible for initializing projects based on templates, managing template registration and execution of setup and post-processing scripts.

classes.name: TemplateProvider
classes.description: Class providing templates from a specified source directory.

classes.name: NuxtTemplate
classes.description: Template class specific for Nuxt projects, capable of retrieving initialization info and generating project files.

methods.name: get_init_info
methods.description: Method of the NuxtTemplate class that returns the initialization information for the template, including environment setup commands.

methods.name: initialize_project
methods.description: Method of ProjectInitializer that performs the project setup, file generation, and post-processing execution.

methods.name: wait_for_post_process_completed
methods.description: Method of ProjectInitializer that waits for the completion of post-processing scripts.

methods.name: load_config
methods.description: Static method of ProjectInitializer to load project configuration from a JSON or YAML file.
